ygData.messageBody:
Anarchy Online

On 5/7/02 11:09 AM, "Rob LeBeau" <rlebeau65@...> wrote:

> What is AO?
>
> I know of Asherons Call and Dark Ages of Camelot but
> AO?
>
> Thanks
> --- Ashley Dusenbery <ashley@...> wrote:
>> If you think AO is any different in terms beter
>> customer service, tight dev
>> cycles, GM events, etc. you are dead wrong. Don?t
>> get me wrong, AO is a
>> great game. But it is as bad (or worse) than EQ is
>> terms of customer
>> service.
>>
>> On 5/7/02 9:30 AM, "nara MKs"

>>

>> people

>>> politics and greed...AO is looking REALLY good
>> about
>>> now
>>>
>>> Amaiya, 21st season Druid
>>> Fennin Ro
>>>
